description: Grab your dicks and get ready for one of our hottest Backroom Live shows ever! We took our cameras down to Palm Springs, California where we caught up with Kyle King and Matt Cole on the set of Trunks 6. After a scorching-hot shoot in the 90 degree sun, Kyle and Matt chill out in the pool. They talk about everything: working out, their favorite scenes, Matt's return to the business, and even Kyle's kittens. When they start kissing Kyle's cock gets hard and Matt goes to work. Kyle spends a lot of time eating Matt's huge ass - it's an all around rocking good time under the California sun!
title: Kyle King And Matt Cole, Scene #01
